EditContextCharacterBoundsRangeStart.summary: The characterBoundsRangeStart read-only property of the interface indicates the index of the character, within the editable text content, that corresponds to the first item in the array.

remarks.para: For example, if the EditContent contains the characters abc, and if characterBoundRangeStart is 1, the first item in the characterBounds array contains the bounds for the character b.
